page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our Domesday area includes the villages of Brighstone and Mottistone and the countryside around them.They are on the southwest coast of the Isle of Wight. Our block contains coastline, farmland and a little downland. The village of Brighstone is in a valley between the hills and the coast. The area is a popular place for tourists and a pleasant one for locals,although perhaps a little isolated from large shopping centres. The tourists are attracted by picturesque scenery, the old buildings, the sea, Brighstone tea_gardens and the campsite on the coast. The countryside is a mixture of grazing,arable and woodland. The whole patchwork landscape can be seen from Brighstone downs from a viewpoint out of our area.
